# How to Add locations to Launcher?

## Once your Location Launcher is setup, it's time to Add Locations!

#### **ðŸš§ How to add 'Launching' Locations:**

1. ![Screenshot 2024-04-03 at 3.34.24 PM](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Screenshot%202024-04-03%20at%203.34.24%20PM.png?width=257&height=437&name=Screenshot%202024-04-03%20at%203.34.24%20PM.png)On the Locations tab, select '+ New Location' and choose 'Launch with Launcher'
2. Follow the on-screen instructions to input essential details such as location type, store address, lifecycle stage, and more.
3. After inputting the required information and setting up the store's login, proceed to add Project Details. Select the checklists for the location to complete and include the estimated Go-Live date along with the supervisors. (Remember, as superadmins, you are a Supervisor by default).
4. Next step is to add and invite Owners to join Delightree and begin using Location Launcher for their new store opening! ðŸŽ‰

_**Explore "Using Location Launcher: A Guide for Franchisors" for further insights!**_

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
